data.name: Antonio Guzmán Vilchis
data.Profile: I am 24 years old, I am currently studying a degree in computer engineering at the 'Universidad Autónoma Metropolitana' (UAM-C) I am passionate about the world of web development, my main focus is to create applications with high impact on society, my goals as a developer web is to specialize within the fullstack area in a company that fits my values.
